creator: dread@hp.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text:
WORKDAY is not supported yet. You'll need to add support for it, then please send in a patch

If you're not sure how to go about adding a new function, please ask on the dev list.
It seems this is fixed since some time, at least the current 3.13-dev version can do this just fine.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
